channel.title: Nedal on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Nedal on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Hurricane Ned
item.description: If you haven’t been following the modern metal scene, you’ve apparently been missing out on a lot of bands pigging out on pop-culture references in the best way possible. Last month, a trio of bands went on tour that make Tenacious D look like they’re not high-concept enough. The two co-headliners of the 2017 Mockstrosity Tour were weird enough: Metalachi, a mariachi-themed metal band, shared the stage with Mac Sabbath, a McDonald’s-themed Black Sabbath cover band.
